section.title: Capacity Reporting and Monasca Transform
section.para: Capacity reporting is a new feature in &productname; which will provide cloud operators overall capacity (available, used, and remaining) information via the &opscon; so that the cloud operator can ensure that cloud resource pools have sufficient capacity to meet the demands of users. The cloud operator is also able to set thresholds and set alarms to be notified when the thresholds are reached.

listitem.para: Host Capacity - CPU/Disk/Memory: Used, Available and Remaining Capacity - for the entire cloud installation or by host
VM Capacity - CPU/Disk/Memory: Allocated, Available and Remaining - for the entire cloud installation, by host or by project
Disk Capacity - Used, Available and Remaining Capacity - for the entire cloud installation or by project

section.para: In addition to overall capacity, roll up views with appropriate slices provide views by a particular project, or compute node. Graphs also show trends and the change in capacity over time.
